data.title: Friend Ornament

data.text:
Hand-blown glass ornament with sentiment and glittery accents lights up from within. Heart charm personalized with a friend's name. Keepsake gift box.

Measures approximately 14 cm H

ne of the things that makes the holidays so special is the love and company of precious friends. Why not let them know how much they mean to you with this beautiful friend ornament from your heart. Exclusively from The Bradford Exchange, the Friends Like You Are Precious and Few Personalized Ornament is an heirloom keepsake they will enjoy adding to their annual Christmas decor.
